replies.body: You forgot the players that just say "Ez" without the gg, theyre my FAVORITE

> [{quoted}](name=SCP 106,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-18T00:00:08.633+0000)
>
> You forgot the players that just say "Ez" without the gg, theyre my FAVORITE

Especially when on your team but contributed nothing but dying 15 times, yup you sure deserved that LP alright

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Endeavor,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-11-18T00:13:28.238+0000)
>
> Especially when on your team but contributed nothing but dying 15 times, yup you sure deserved that LP alright

There is another sad side to that.
Ez.
I feel so weird when I see people with honor 5 spamming ez at the end of the game. Goes to show how pointless honor 5 really is, but I guess I'm not complaining cuz free skins atleast, lol.

Honor only indicates how good of a teammate you are. It says nothing about how you are to your opponents. You're prob just salty cuz you're honor 1 or 0 or something.

GGEZ for the effort tho.

> [{quoted}](name=ZaFishbone,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-11-18T14:40:48.347+0000)
>
> Honor only indicates how good of a teammate you are. It says nothing about how you are to your opponents. You're prob just salty cuz you're honor 1 or 0 or something.
> 
> GGEZ for the effort tho.

I'm Honor 5. I just don't feel to special about it when my (also) honor 4/5 top laner is flaming me all game.

Good job making assumptions and trying to belittle me with your "ggez" though :)

The ggez is obviously there to make fun of your stance in the context of the title. But I guess you're right about honor being wrongly given. I mean you're obviously a no fun guy who can't read the humor in the situation, you're probably no fun at parties and a bore to be around. If honor were given for your interactions instead of carrying, you probably wouldn't be 5.

> [{quoted}](name=ZaFishbone,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-20T08:55:40.700+0000)
>
> The ggez is obviously there to make fun of your stance in the context of the title. But I guess you're right about honor being wrongly given. I mean you're obviously a no fun guy who can't read the humor in the situation, you're probably no fun at parties and a bore to be around. If honor were given for your interactions instead of carrying, you probably wouldn't be 5.

obviously, thought you would have learned by now not to jump to conclusions but apparently you can completely profile strangers on the internet by reading two comments. Yes insulting people is so funny hehe xd i cant imagine why very many people would like to hang around you.

if thats what you think you missed the point of his post. 

honor is NOT supposed to be reflective of how exactly as you said, how good of a teammate you are (not to be confused with how hard you carried or such), but mainly how much *you as a player make the game enjoyable*, this of course includes interactions with the enemy team.
spouting something intentionally meant to belittle/tilt others is the exact opposite of the reason it was created.

besides, you can still lose honor or get a chat restriction or ban for belittling opponents.

I'm just using basic logic. Honor is influenced almost solely by our teammates and our actions towards them. And I'm not talking about how it should be, I'm talking about how it **is**. Downvoting me doesn't change reality one bit.
Yep

True Damage Qiyana has "GG EZ" written on her tongue, which implies that Riot officially endorses this expression.

=\
To be fair. By lore Qiyana is a pretty arrogant ... I would say this "GG EZ" just fits her charakter.
Qiyana is the *exact* kind of person to say "gg ez"

> [{quoted}](name=SparteN7,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2019-11-18T13:55:05.587+0000)
>
> To be fair. By lore Qiyana is a pretty arrogant ... I would say this "GG EZ" just fits her charakter.

Maybe it's not a good idea to release champions with that kind of character, then? Should Hillbilly Gragas get some new voice lines with racist slurs?

Why should they be limited?

Just because their world is fake/virtual, doesn't mean they should all have the same personalities.

> [{quoted}](name=Beacon Academy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=000b000000000002,timestamp=2019-11-19T05:54:22.043+0000)
>
> Why should they be limited?
> 
> Just because their world is fake/virtual, doesn't mean they should all have the same personalities.

They should limit that if they plan on using those characters to break the fourth wall. Turning a "spoiled princess" trope into a "toxic LoL player" LoL ad is... suboptimal.
Then you couldn't write any kind of evil charakter. Also going from something stupid like ez to racism is a huge step.

> [{quoted}](name=SparteN7,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=000b000000000003,timestamp=2019-11-19T05:54:26.260+0000)
>
> Then you couldn't write any kind of evil charakter. Also going from something stupid like ez to racism is a huge step.

It's fine writing evil characters as long as it doesn't result in actually promoting that kind of behavior. "GG EZ" is not something that any champ should be saying, honestly. But it's official now, so say it to your heart's content.

not all hillbillies/rednecks are racist though. 

the one qiyana in game we have however, is an arrogant ass.

> [{quoted}](name=FOR JUSTICE,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=000b000000000001,timestamp=2019-11-19T03:56:06.596+0000)
>
> not all hillbillies/rednecks are racist though. 
> 
> the one qiyana in game we have however, is an arrogant ass.

Not all residents of rural areas are racist, of course, but maybe Hillbilly Gragas is.

Or perhaps it would be easier to start fresh and put out a new champ who was exiled from their home region for forbidden magic, insubordination to a superior officer, and homophobia. Suddenly the F word starts showing up in official Riot media, because it's part of that champion's character!

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2019-11-18T22:29:53.993+0000)
>
> Maybe it's not a good idea to release champions with that kind of character, then? Should Hillbilly Gragas get some new voice lines with racist slurs?

Come on billy bob we got some minorities to oppress !
True Damage Qiyana is the embodiment of everything I hate about society.
ya, i remember the homepage of their site said some shit like GG NOOB. way back ago in like s2/3 its like rly, youre standing up for toxicity? what a fkin joke

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-11-18T12:45:33.050+0000)
>
> True Damage Qiyana has "GG EZ" written on her tongue, which implies that Riot officially endorses this expression.

Let's not mix what's in game with players' behaviour basically outside of it. (Because the chat is player talking to player, not game character talking to another character. So it's not really part of the game, it's just there for players' convenience).
It's perfectly fine if a game character trash talks its enemy. After all it's fine if they chop off their head or burn them alive. It wouldn't be fine if a player did that to another player.
So it's kinda like saying that Riot approves of shooting people with a minigun.
The people who say ez are also the people who often got carried by their teammates.

> [{quoted}](name=Crescent Dusk,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-11-18T02:48:42.979+0000)
>
> The people who say ez are also the people who often got carried by their teammates.

They are also super easy to tilt. Often their mood is like a swing: they're trash talking whenever they get ahead, and raging like crazy when things aren't going their way.
well, if u get carried by your team it means that you won't need any effort to win therefore -> 3Z PZ learn to play k1d

My favourite:

Enemy 2/15/2 who is carried: GG EZ.

> [{quoted}](name=Diopsideˆ,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-11-18T06:25:24.200+0000)
>
> My favourite:
> 
> Enemy 2/15/2 who is carried: GG EZ.

Teemo: "I tanked everything for the team"

3 hour long match with brutal power struggles.

Dumbest anus alive: "gg ez"

People who say EZ are more likely to stay in low elo.

Food for thought.

> [{quoted}](name=Milky Thighs,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HBK4rP6i,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-11-18T03:34:33.622+0000)
 
People do this in high elo, I've seen it in diamond and master games
When you report someone for saying ez and a few games later you get the instand feedback that said person got punished 8)
you forget the teammates who do nothing but die and yell at the team all game then when you miraculously win they say 'LOL gg ez noobs'
That's the kind of person who you can just tell has a sub 45 win rate
You forgot the infamous "GG WP EZ" :|
I always like to let me enemy know they put up a good fight against me.

everone is thinking it, youre the guy to say it

i imagine those r%%%%%s exactly like that
I got stomped anonymous support group in here
what if the other team's ezreal did well so gg ez means good game ezreal?
